task: Check the storage options and prices for the latest iPad Pro models on Apple's website.
observation:
The user has successfully navigated to the buying options page for the 11-inch iPad Pro model with Wi-Fi on Apple's website. The current page shows detailed information on storage options and prices for this model, which fulfills the task goal of checking these details. Specifically, the storage options available are:
- 256GB starting from $999 or $83.25 per month for 12 months,
- 512GB starting from $1199 or $99.91 per month for 12 months,
- 1TB starting from $1599 or $133.25 per month for 12 months, and
- 2TB starting from $1899 or $158.25 per month for 12 months. 

Additionally, there are options for choosing color (Space Black or Silver), glass type (Standard or Nano-texture), and connectivity (Wi-Fi or Wi-Fi + Cellular). Furthermore, the user can opt for free engraving. 

This summary reflects only the most recent observations. Please refer to the complete task history for full context.
